Title: Requires windows in newly constructed multiple dwellings with two or more stories to be fitted with key-operated window locks
Summary: Requires windows in newly constructed multiple dwellings with two or more stories to be fitted with key-operated window locks that restrict the window from opening more than four inches.
LawCode: Amd ยง30, Mult Dwell L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple dwelling law, in relation to requiring windows in new multiple dwellings exceeding one story in height to be fitted with key-operated window locks
